content.raw: Hi Jordan. It looks like you have the video already, so you just need to host it somewhere \(for example, YouTube\), and put the link in a text file in your local copy of your forked repository. Then move the .mlt file and the .mp4 file out of your local repository and commit the changes. Once they are committed you should be able to push them from your local machine to the remote repository.
content.html: Hi Jordan. It looks like you have the video already, so you just need to host it somewhere (for example, YouTube), and put the link in a text file in your local copy of your forked repository. Then move the .mlt file and the .mp4 file out of your local repository and commit the changes. Once they are committed you should be able to push them from your local machine to the remote repository.
